descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#3d85c6][size=5][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][b]Rebekah 2.0[/b][/font][/size][/color][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2]
[/size][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2][b]Standalone Follower[/b]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2]
[b]Name:[/b] Rebekah
[b]Race:[/b] Custom Race based on Nord with some changes and her own skeleton
[b]Style combat:[/b] She is Master on Dual Casting Destruction Frost Spells
[b]Location:[/b] She lives with the Greybeards on High Hrothgar
[b]Marriable:[/b] Yes[/size][/font][size=2]
[/size]
[size=2][b]Improvements: [/b]
Leyenda Skin 3.0 combined with snowflake overlays from Teylin (Thank you!)
[/size]Three looks to choose
Two outfit variations
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2][size=2]Boots fixed[/size][/size][/font], no more sink on the ground

[img]http://i.imgur.com/nhFSOif.jpg[/img]

Hope you like and enjoy traveling with her around the Skyrim world!
[/size][/font][size=2]
[size=2][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2]Have a nice day!

...and feel free to upload your own images!![/size][/font][/font][/size]



[youtube]m__EA5EzuAg[/youtube]



[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][b]REQUIREMENTS:[/b]
None[/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][b][size=2][size=2][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[/font][/size][/size]
